text:
Parsable - San Francisco,CA & Vancouver,BC - Full Time Onsite

Parsable is a mobile collaboration and workflow platform (Product Video: http://goo.gl/68hyJb)

Company Culture: https://goo.gl/Tw5Kq1

We're looking for Android, Backend Eng, Backend Team Lead and others:

All Openings: https://goo.gl/hkVQS2

Yaletown, Vancouver: - Sr. Product Designer - Sr iOS Engineer - Sr. Product Manager

SoMa, San Francisco: - Android Eng - Mobile Eng Lead - Sr Backend Eng - Backend Eng Lead - Product Designer - Sr Recruiter - Demand Generation Leader - Sales Development Rep - Sr Product Manager
